body:
It may just be that our timeout isn't long enough or something, but this test doesn't seem like GCE flakiness would affect it, meaning the issue is with the test itself. More worrisome than the average flake because it's on the 1.1 branch.

cc @erictune 

Test output:


labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: Job e2e test flake on release-1.1 branch: should run a job to completion when tasks sometimes fail and are locally restarted
